translated: The Three-Part Collection🔽The Elder Nun Dantikā
Having left my dwelling for the day,
I saw a nāga emerging from the water,
on the bank of the river.
A man with a hook in his hand
asked for its foot, saying, ‘Give me your foot.’
and the man mounted the nāga.
and under the control of a human,
and then went to the forest.”
